snippet.title: Planet Coaster: Console Edition | Dev Diary #1 | Expanding the Experience
snippet.description:
We’re thrilled to introduce you to the first of a series of Dev Diaries taking a look at the development of Planet Coaster: Console Edition.

Planet Coaster: Console Edition is coming to PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One and Xbox Series X in Holiday 2020.

Build and manage your way to coaster-creating fame! Deep physics-based systems mean you're in for the ride of your life, so dream big and build even bigger as you create your coaster park empire.

For more news and information about Planet Coaster:

Website: https://planetcoaster.com/
Forums: https://forums.planetcoaster.com/
Facebook: https://facebook.com/PlanetCoaster
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlanetCoaster
